text:
@MikeBloomberg Exactly. Please wear masks. Follow every guidelines issued by government. Hope everything will be fine soon. Let's pray together and hope for the best.
#TogetherWeCan #StayHomeStaySafe #StayHomeSaveLives #stayhomestaystrong #IndiaFightsCorona #worldsfightcorona #COVID19 #pandemic
